definitions.definition: An expression consisting of a sum of a finite number of terms , each term being the product of a constant coefficient and one or more variables raised to a non-negative integer power, such as a n x n + a n − 1 x n − 1 + . . . + a 0 x 0 {\displaystyle a_{n}x^{n}+a_{n-1}x^{n-1}+...+a_{0}x^{0}} .
A taxonomic designation (such as of a subspecies ) consisting of more than two terms .

main_definition: ( algebra , strict sense ) An expression consisting of a sum of a finite number of terms , each term being the product of a constant coefficient and one or more variables raised to a non-negative integer power, such as a n x n + a n − 1 x n − 1 + . . . + a 0 x 0 {\displaystyle a_{n}x^{n}+a_{n-1}x^{n-1}+...+a_{0}x^{0}} .
secondary_definitions: ( taxonomy ) A taxonomic designation (such as of a subspecies ) consisting of more than two terms .
